data.text: @AigburthTap Yes it is! Drop us a line on orders@wiperandtrue.com and we can tell you which ones.
@WiperAndTrue Is it going to any wholesalers?
@Benfield13 We'll see what we can do!
@mars_1871 We've got some heading out via wholesalers, so hopefully it'll make its way into the pubs of Manchester 🙌
@WiperAndTrue It’s been years since last time I had a pint of Kaleidoscope on cask. I remember it being absolute lovely. So that’s great news! Hope to find some in Manchester as well at some point 🤞
@WiperAndTrue Any way we can get it to Ramsgate please 🙏

Whatever it is, we think it's a darn near-perfect pint, and we're so pleased it's back. Head to our blog post to check out the brilliant Bristol pubs that will be serving Cask Kaleidoscope from this week, and please do go and support them. Long live cask!

https://t.co/5JQYGUKYIx

It's hard to put into words exactly what makes the cask edition of our flagship beer so enjoyable. Perhaps it's the the final sugars fermenting in cask; perhaps it's the unparalleled smoothness of the finished serve, with its gentle carbonation and elegant, refined flavours.
